DOC.brief_summary: In Turku PET Centre , 3 positron emission tomography study brown adipose tissue ( BAT ) activity healthy adult . BATPET perform 2008 2009 . FATBAT start 2011 Dixon-BAT 2012 currently ongoing . In current study , participant BATPET , FATBAT Dixon-BAT study recruit follow-up study examine association obesity , cardiovascular risk factor , serum metabolic profile BAT structure baseline follow-up several year later . 43 BATPET participant call follow-up 2013 follow-up period 5 year 52 FATBAT Dixon-BAT participant year 2014 2015 follow-up period 3 year . The aim study examine longitudinal association BAT function structure , liver adiposity cardiovascular risk factor baseline follow-up .
DOC.brief_title: Longitudinal Follow-up Brown Adipose Tissue Function Structure
DOC.criteria: All study subject screen prior acceptance BATPET , FATBAT DixonBAT study screen inclusion require current study . 1 ) Smoking 2 ) Blood pressure > 160/100 mmHg 3 ) Pregnancy lactation 4 ) Medication ( expect effect study variable )
